column2: "Even though I'm trying to stay undetected, I always end up running into you."
"By the way, did you participate in the ARKS Battle Tournament?"
"To be honest, I actually attended that, too. It was pretty fun."
"What? Was it okay for me to participate in that?"
"Also, why would I want to participate at all?"
"I can see why you would think that, because my name would be published."
"I guess you could say it's a form of insurance, it's better to know if something is going on."
"Rather than being on the back end, it's better to be aware of any problems in advance, don't you think?"
"Also, it was a good chance for collecting data and keeping tabs on everyone."
"Also, the more attention I draw to myself, the easier it is for others to move around undetected."
"Though, I suppose I should admit the real reason was simply to have fun."
"I didn't expect myself to get as carried away as much as I did."
"Admittedly afterwards, I got in a lot of trouble."
"But that's really not my problem, so I suppose it was worth it."
